ygData.subject: Re: LVL9 spells and armor
ygData.msgSnippet: gad man...hehe lightstones are one of the BEST lightsources in the game.....they aren t as good as infravision, but they do help us blind humans out...i know
ygData.messageBody:
gad man...hehe lightstones are one of the BEST lightsources in the game.....they
aren't as good as infravision, but they do help us blind humans out...i know
when i die and i don't have my lightstone, i have to conjure one up...otherwise,
i'd be lost in some areas.....o btw, if you're a human cleric, i suggest getting
halo of light at whatever lv you can use it...it will come in handy (;

(\/)ystik Spellchaser
lv 38 human cleric of The Rathe

curtis bennett wrote:

> From: curtis bennett <die_kluge@...>
>
> Ok, excuse my ignornace, but what are lightstones, and why are they
> so valuable?
>
> >From: "John Erik Maynus" <jmaynus@...>
> >
> >Thats not 100% true, I've known people to still get lightstones off Wisp.
> >I
> >just bought a Greater Lightstone off someone yesterday. About a month ago
> >in West Karana someone was saying that there was still lightstones,
> >greater,
> >nosave and they even said something about a lesser lightstone. Not sure if
> >there really is a Lesser one or not. But from what I've heard they are
> >still good lightstone on the game to loot off wisp.
> >
> >**************************
> >Azor
> >Lvl 15 Human Cleric of the Rathe
> >**************************
> >
> > >that's a really good idea, but getting the lightstones now is a
> >bust...they
> >took
> > >out looting lightstones and glightstones a while back with a path...now
> >you
> >get
> > >a burned out lightstone or a nosave lightstone...pretty much
> >worthless....if you
> > >had one before the patch, you still have it...<have one on both my toons>
> >but
> > >you can no longer loot em...you still get money off the wisps tho....just
> >root
> > >and blast...doesn't always work, but it sure does help....if you need
> >help,
> >get
> > >a warrior with a combine (; they take the hits, and you can just blast
> > >away...what i did...(:
> > >
> > >(\/)ystik Spellchaser
> > >lv 38 <got my level tongiht (: *cheers*> cleric of The Rathe
> > >now...to get lv 39 for rez.....<G>
